headline.main: Obituary for DDT (in Michigan); Obituary for DDT

docs.abstract: H Higdon article on reasons for DDT ban in Mich; traces history of its use in state, '46-69; some of its beneficial and harmful effects cited; R Carson book Silent Spring, pub in '62, seen alerting pub to dangers of its use; chances for natl ban discussed; illus
